quarenta anos e [redacted_name], comerciante, [redacted_info] anos, casados, naturais de Rio [redacted_info],
(a.), [redacted_name], Escrevente Autorizada, a escrevi.".
sendo avós paternos: [redacted_name] e [redacted_name]; e maternos: [redacted_name] e [redacted_name]. Para
corrente, às treze horas e cinquenta minutos, no domicilio e residencia de seu casal, à [redacted_address]
constar lavrei este termo que lido e certo vai assinado pelo declarante e testemunhas: [redacted_name], pintor, com
dele declarante e de sua esposa [redacted_name], de prendas domesticas, natural de [redacted_info]; casados neste cartório:
três, neste distrito, nasceu uma criança, do sexo feminino, de cor branca, que vai chamar:[redacted_name], filha legitima
adotou: [redacted_name], conforme L.o B - 119, fIs. 287, n.o 211. Jundiai, 14/2/76. O escrevente autorizado, [redacted_name]. A MARGEM DO TERMO CONSTA O SEGUINTE: Anotação n.o 1. A registrada casou-se neste distrito,
[redacted_name]. AVERBAÇÃO DE CPF: A registrada está inscrita no CPF/MF sob n° [redacted_id]. Jundiai, 30/09/2024. Eu,
trans:
forty years old and [redacted_name], merchant, [redacted_info] years old, married, from Rio [redacted_info],
(a.), [redacted_name], Authorised Scribe, wrote it".
being the paternal grandparents: [redacted_name] and [redacted_name]; and maternal grandparents: [redacted_name] and [redacted_name]. Currently,
at thirteen hours and fifty minutes, at the home and residence of their couple, at [redacte_name]
for the record, I have drawn up this deed, which, has been read, reviewed and signed by the declarant and the witnesses: [redacted_name], painter, with
that of the declarant and his wife [redacted_name], domestic worker, born in [redacted_info]; married in this registry office:
three, in this district, a child has been born, female, white in colour, who will be called: [redacted_name], legitimate daughter
adopted: [redacted_name], according to L. o B - 119, pages 287, no. 211. Jundiai, 14/2/76. The authorised scribe, [redacted_name]. THE MARGIN OF THE TERM CONTAINS THE FOLLOWING: Annotation no. 1. The registered woman was married in this district,
[redacted_name]. CPF VERIFICATION: The registrant is registered with the CPF/MF under no. [redacted_id]. Jundiai, 30/09/2024. Me,
